Class SpaceShip

  • java.lang.Object
    • SpaceShip
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AggressiveSpaceShip, BasherSpaceShip, DrunkardSpaceShip, HumanSpaceShip, RunnerSpaceShip, SpecialSpaceShip

    public abstract class SpaceShip
extends java.lang.Object
    The API spaceships need to implement for the SpaceWars game. This class is an abstract class of spaceships. It defines a general spaceship with general properties. each of the 6 different types of spaceships will inherit from this class.
    Author:
    Ori Broda

        public SpaceShip()

    • Method Detail

      • doAction

        public abstract void doAction(SpaceWars game)
        Does the actions of this ship for this round. This is called once per round by the SpaceWars game driver.
        Parameters:
        game - the game object to which this ship belongs.

      • collidedWithAnotherShip

        public void collidedWithAnotherShip()
        This method is called every time a collision with this ship occurs

      • reset

        public void reset()
        This method is called whenever a ship has died. It resets the ship's attributes, and starts it at a new random position.

      • isDead

        public boolean isDead()
        Checks if this ship is dead.
        Returns:
        true if the ship is dead. false otherwise.

      • getPhysics

        public oop.ex2.SpaceShipPhysics getPhysics()
        Gets the physics object that controls this ship.
        Returns:
        the physics object that controls the ship.

      • gotHit

        public void gotHit()
        This method is called by the SpaceWars game object when ever this ship gets hit by a shot or collides with another ship when the shields are down.

      • getImage

        public abstract java.awt.Image getImage()
        Gets the image of this ship. This method should return the image of the ship with or without the shield. This will be displayed on the GUI at the end of the round.
        Returns:
        the image of this ship.

      • fire

        public void fire(SpaceWars game)
        Attempts to fire a shot.
        Parameters:
        game - the game object.

      • shieldOn

        public void shieldOn()
        Attempts to turn on the shield.

      • teleport

        public void teleport()
        Attempts to teleport.

      • energyCharge

        protected void energyCharge()
        Method to enable constant energy increase per round.

      • shouldTurn

        protected abstract int shouldTurn(SpaceWars game)
        Turns the spaceship in some direction. It will be implemented differently according to the type of the spaceship.
        Parameters:
        game - the game object to which this ship belongs.
        Returns:
        the direction in which the spaceship will turn.

      • angleToClosestShip

        protected double angleToClosestShip(SpaceWars game)
        Returns the angle to the closest ship to our spaceship.
        Parameters:
        game - the game object to which this ship belongs.
        Returns:
        the angle to the closest ship.

      • distanceToClosestShip

        protected double distanceToClosestShip(SpaceWars game)
        Returns the distance to the closest ship to our spaceship.
        Parameters:
        game - the game object to which this ship belongs.
        Returns:
        the distance to the closest ship.
